ygData.subject: Re: RANT!
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think you were the only one, Cronik.  They were still patching last night on our server when I finally gave up and got some much needed sleep. I m sure
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think you were the only one, Cronik. They were still patching last
night on our server when I finally gave up and got some much needed sleep.
I'm sure the servers that weren't being actively patched were experiencing
lag due to that.

Naela
Quellios

BTW, the spellcasting madmen con ridiculously low for their level. Green
ones used to easily take out my 17th level ranger if he wasn't SOW'ed. The
non-casters are much easier.

According to the illustrious rich.hitz@......
<snip>
:)I lagged so bad last night it took me an hour to get
:)from Oasis to Neriak to invite someone into the guild!
:)By the time I got there they had logged off.
:)
:)If Verant or Cerfnet or who ever just made an upgrade to
:)the hardware, why is there so much lag? It seems to be
:)getting worse, not better with each "upgrade". I am not
:)a hardware tech, but can someone tell me why? I used
:)the UOTracer program that pings every server your
:)connection uses to connect to EQ, and all are ok until I
:)get to the EQ servers.
:)Even people I know with cable modems were lagging last
:)night.
:)
:)Ok, that is enough for now, but more will be coming. :)
:)
:)--
:)Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
:)Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer

:)14th Season Troll SK
:)Bertoxxulous
:)
:)"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
:)blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
:)for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
:)smash'm fun."
